Below you will find a preview of the data imported from your file.
To make sure your product data is matched correctly, please assign the following attributes to the corresponding column of your imported table.

20, 102-01-013, Item Reference
30, 102-01-014, Item Reference
(Quantity, Distrelec Article Number/MPN Number, Item Reference)

Copy and paste your product list
Use the following format with a COMMA as a separator.
bomdataimport.descriptionExample:

50 102-01-012 Spares for engineer
20 102-01-013 Stock Top-up
30 102-01-014 Your Reference

bomdataimport.introduction:
Upload your .csv or .xls file with the BOM File Import Tool.
You can also download the Distrelec Excel Template for an easier import.
